allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: groqDeveloper R package

- Implements ProviderGroqDeveloper S7 class extending ellmer::ProviderOpenAI
- Adds chat_groq_developer\(\) function for Groq API integration
- Overrides chat_body method to remove unsupported ''include'' field
- Implements strict JSON schema validation with additionalProperties: false
- Inherits batch and parallel processing from ProviderOpenAI
- Full testthat infrastructure with 44 tests across 4 test files
- Passes devtools::check\(\) with 0 errors, 0 warnings, 0 notes

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix parallel_chat_structured: filter additional unsupported Groq fields

Removes store, reasoning, and service_tier fields from request body
in addition to include field. These fields are added by ellmer''s
ProviderOpenAI but are not supported by Groq''s API.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix parallel_chat_structured by extending ProviderOpenAICompatible

Changed parent class from ProviderOpenAI to ProviderOpenAICompatible.
ProviderOpenAI uses the OpenAI Responses API format \(with text, input,
include fields\) which Groq doesn''t support. ProviderOpenAICompatible
uses the Chat Completions API format \(response_format, messages\) that
Groq''s API expects.

- Removed chat_body override \(no longer needed\)
- Updated tests to check for ProviderOpenAICompatible parent
- Renamed test-batch-support.R to test-provider-inheritance.R

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
